attributes.action: No more Conservative voted Prime Minster - We want a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: Debate and vote on a General Election now.
attributes.background: The Conservative party is about to elect again another Prime Minister with less than 1% of the population. This isn't democratic. We need a General Election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
